name: doctor appointment
about: for doctor and partent appointment system management
describe: Admin and customers can access different routes. Social login is implemented with firebase.

After signup, a customer will be needing their JWT token, with this token customers can order a bunch of products at once, pay with an international card (stripe), do reviews and edit if necessary, and also keep their profile updated.

An admin manages orders, changes shipping status, deletes orders, updates user status, and removes things not deemed necessary. Every function is handled on dashboard which is implemented by react router v6 (Outlet)
